amendment.description: An amendment to reduce funding for the Office of Surface Mining Reclamation and Enforcement by 2 million and increase the State and Tribal Assistance Grants by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: Amendment reduces funding for the Office of Surface Mining Reclamation and Enforcement by $2 million and tranfers the funds to the Drinking Water State Revolving Funds.
